title: Mathieu van der Poel brings rainbows to GP Plouay: ‘Being present as world champion is the main reason’
content:
Team downplays MvdP's ambitions as he closes out blockbuster season with series of one-dayers and Olympic MTB test event.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel brings rainbows to GP Plouay: ‘Being present as world champion is the main reason’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
